translations: 加标签（label 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 标明对环境的影响；环境标记

sentences.sentence: Thanks to a new directive, food labelling will be more specific.
sentences.translation: 由于官方的一项新指令，食品标签将会更明确具体。

sentences.sentence: If labelling obesity as a disease was harmless then it wouldn't really matter, he writes.
sentences.translation: 他写道，如果把肥胖列为一种疾病不会产生危害，那就没什么影响。
